function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of inaccurate or unreliable data from multiple sources leading to incorrect decision-making","Impact":"Ineffective management of COVID-19 crisis, potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implement data validation and verification processes, use of reliable data sources","Technologies":"Data validation tools, AI-powered analytics","People":"Public health agencies, decision-makers","Owner":"Public health agencies, IT teams"},{"Description":"Potential misuse of autonomous robots for disinfection leading to improper disinfection or safety hazards","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission, safety hazards for staff and individuals","Mitigation":"Strict guidelines for robot operation, regular monitoring and maintenance, safety training for staff","Technologies":"Robot operation protocols, monitoring sensors","People":"Local authorities, hospital staff","Owner":"Local authorities, hospital management"},{"Description":"Privacy and security risks associated with the use of user data for diagnosis and tracking","Impact":"Potential spread of misinformation, breach of user privacy, distrust in the system","Mitigation":"Implement robust data security measures, ensure user consent and transparency in data usage","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure communication protocols","People":"Users, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, data security teams"}]}
